name: Spicy Kale and Shrimp Soup
author: Bethie
summary: This soup is full of flavor and so healthy! You can adjust the heat by altering the amount of curry paste you use; a little goes a long way. A lemon wedge is the perfect garnish.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (8 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-low heat
Cook and stir mushrooms, onion, carrots, and garlic in the hot oil until tender, 5 to 7 minutes
Pour chicken broth into the saucepan; add basil
Bring broth to a boil, reduce heat to low, place a cover on the saucepan, and simmer until the basil seasons the broth, about 10 minutes
Stir kale, curry paste, salt, and pepper into the broth; bring to a boil again, reduce heat to low, and simmer until kale softens, about 10 minutes
Stir shrimp, tomatoes, kidney beans, and lemon juice into broth; cook at a simmer until shrimp is bright pink on the outside and the meat is no longer transparent in the center, about 10 minutes
